file.name: mailboxvalidator.com-checker-1.0.0-openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
servers:
  - url: https://api.mailboxvalidator.com/
info:
  contact:
    x-twitter: MailBoxV
  description: The MailboxValidator Free Email Checker checks if a single email address is
    from a free email provider and returns the results in either JSON or XML
    format. Refer to https://www.mailboxvalidator.com/api-email-freem for
    further information.
  title: MailboxValidator Free Email Checker
  version: 1.0.0
  x-apisguru-categories:
    - email
  x-logo:
    url: https://twitter.com/MailBoxV/profile_image?size=original
  x-origin:
    - converter:
        url: https://github.com/lucybot/api-spec-converter
        version: 2.7.31
      format: openapi
      url: https://api.swaggerhub.com/apis/mailboxvalidator/MailboxValidator-Free-Email-Checker/1.0.0
      version: "3.0"
  x-providerName: mailboxvalidator.com
  x-serviceName: checker
paths:
  /v1/email/free:
    get:
      description: The Free Email Checker API does validation on a single email address and
        returns if it is from a free email provider in either JSON or XML
        format.
      parameters:
        - description: Return the result in json (default) or xml format.
          in: query
          name: format
          schema:
            enum:
              - json
              - xml
            type: string
        - description: The email address to check if is from a free email provider.
          in: query
          name: email
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: API key.
          in: query
          name: key
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json; charset=utf-8:
              examples:
                "0":
                  value: '{"email_address":"","is_free":"","credits_available":"","error_code":"","error_message":""}'
              schema:
                type: string
          description: free email checker response
